sentences.sContent: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
sentences.sContent_eng: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
sentences.sCn: 你们当侧耳听我的声音，留心听我的言语。

sentences.sContent: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
sentences.sContent_eng: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
sentences.sCn: 众弟子阿，你们当来听我的话。 我要将敬畏耶和华的道教训你们。

sentences.sContent: The household went to bed; and I' too anxious to lie down, opened my lattice and put my head out to hearken, though it rained: determined to admit them in spite of the prohibition, should they return.
sentences.sContent_eng: The household went to bed; and I' too anxious to lie down, opened my lattice and put my head out to hearken, though it rained: determined to admit them in spite of the prohibition, should they return.
sentences.sCn: 全家都去睡了，我急得躺不住，便把我的窗子打开，伸出头去倾听着，虽然在下雨，我决定只要是他们回来，我就不顾禁令，让他们进来。
